title: Netflix Stock Has Been Slumping. One Analyst Doesn’t See Earnings Helping.
text:
Netflix stock has lagged the market in 2019, and KeyBanc Capital Markets warns that the streaming-video company’s upcoming earnings report may not do much to move the needle in that regard.

The back story. Netflix stock (ticker: NFLX) is up about 7% year to date through Friday’s close, compared with more than a 17% rise for the S&P 500, and double-digit gains for the other four stocks that make up the FAANG cohort—Facebook (FB), Amazon.com (AMZN), Apple (AAPL), and Google parent Alphabet (GOOGL). Investors have been...
description: KeyBanc analyst Andy Hargreaves wrote that the near-term risk-reward profile for the video-streaming shares looks neutral. He reiterated a Sector Weight rating on the shares.
